sentences.english: Shen Cheng is a project official with the animal-protection group ACTAsia.
sentences.chinese: 沈成，動物保護組織“行動亞洲”項目官員。

sentences.english: There are many cases of human rights violations filed before the police.
sentences.chinese: 警方接手許多人權侵犯案件，往往牽連到高級官員。

sentences.english: Security officials rushed down the main aisle to detain the woman.
sentences.chinese: 安全官員立馬衝進主通道，扣留了該名女子。

sentences.english: Lobbyists use slush fund to bribe public officials.
sentences.chinese: 院外集團的說客用賄金拉攏政府官員。

sentences.english: Agency officials say the country's weak drug laws are compounding the problem.
sentences.chinese: 該機構官員說，該國薄弱的禁毒法使問題複雜化。

sentences.english: We begin the year with a grey fowl from Quy Nhon.
sentences.chinese: 我們開始了一年的灰色雞從阮貴部門官員。

sentences.english: On the day Xie An assumed office, many officials came to congratulate him.
sentences.chinese: 謝安上任的那一天，很多官員都來祝賀。

sentences.english: No one wanted detainees ” the special-operations officer told me.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人想要的是囚犯，”這個特戰官員告訴我。

sentences.english: The Russian official assessed that Pyongyang was "hunkering down for a succession crisis.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯官員認爲朝鮮會堅守繼承的傳統。

sentences.english: S. officials have dismissed the Chinese proposal as 'untethered from reality.
sentences.chinese: 美國官員曾批評中國的建議太不現實。

sentences.english: Like before, government officials will speak to boost market sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 像以前一樣，政府官員會出面安慰市場情緒。

sentences.english: Some government officials speuak in favour of the company that destroyed the earth.
sentences.chinese: 有些政府官員爲那家破壞地球的公司幫腔。

sentences.english: Officials also said a car on board the ferry or suspected source of fire.
sentences.chinese: 官員還表示，渡輪上搭載的一輛汽車或爲疑似火源。

sentences.english: He is the highest ranking White House official convicted of felony in years.
sentences.chinese: 他是現白宮高級官員這些年被判重刑最嚴重的人員。

sentences.english: Government officials said that the island of Kyushu, the production of tatami rushes is one of the materials.
sentences.chinese: 九州島政府官員說，燈心草是生產榻榻米的材料之一。

sentences.english: The company had to kickback a lot to the corrupt officer.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司必須給腐敗的政府官員很大一筆佣金。

definition: persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
